# CEPH all in one
# Based on image by Ricardo Rocha, ricardo@catalyst.net.nz

FROM fedora
MAINTAINER Jan Safranek jsafrane@redhat.com

# Base Packages
RUN yum install -y wget ceph ceph-fuse strace && yum clean all && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

# Get ports exposed
EXPOSE 6789

ADD ./bootstrap.sh /bootstrap.sh
ADD ./mon.sh /mon.sh
ADD ./osd.sh /osd.sh
ADD ./ceph.conf.sh /ceph.conf.sh
ADD ./keyring /var/lib/ceph/mon/keyring
ADD ./block.tar.gz /

CMD /bootstrap.sh
